Author: jansako#3330
Content:
IMO governance does not fully (edited) equal decision making. Decision is needed when you have a situation such as this:
- "this thing" is possible to do - Fact
- Should "this thing" be allowed to be done? - Decision needed
- If NO, we need a fix to prevent "this thing" being done - Decision needed
- If Yes, should we do "this thing" (Komodo Team), what will be the +/-  - Decision needed based on the goals and vision of the team.

- If Yes, WHO should be able to do "this thing" - Governance and open discussion  needed - NOW we are going 'outside'
